segments.text: Not at all . I ’ m an agnostic . Do you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m not sure . Why don ’ t you believe there is a god ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think everything has a scientific explanation rather than a theological one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I basically believe in science over theology . I mean , I believe in evolution for example . However , there are many things that science hasn ’ t explained yet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sure that science will explain everything eventually . I think that the strangest thing about religion is that so many religions people act in ways that their religion claims are wrong .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Religions preach tolerance , but many wars are caused by intolerant religious fanatics .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Such people don ’ t appear to be acting in accordance with their religious beliefs .
segments.speaker: S1
